page.title: 04Morwenstow Flora and Fauna
page.content: {Flowers On June 7th in a hillside meadow, unploughed within living memory we found and identified 37 different wild flowers. In the whole parish a survey of 25 years ago found a total of over 400 different species of flora. {Hedges The hedgerows around Morwenstow are built of clay often with a stone facing and topped with a variety of trees and plants. Many are very old. To calculate their ages, we used Dr. Max Hooper's equation. {Age of hedge= { (number of species in 30 yards x 110) {+ 20 years. }Most roadside hedges had an average of 6 different trees giving a rough age of{700}years. 32 types of flowers were also noted in one hedge.
